headline: Masco Corporation to Participate in Fireside Chat at Investor Conference
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., November 25, 2024--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that Keith Allman, President and CEO, will participate in a live fireside chat at the UBS Global Industrials & Transportation Conference on Wednesday, December 4, in Palm Beach, Florida at 9:40 a.m. ET.
